name: Discharge (mericonel)
description:
Discharge is a 2 Player Co-Op Shooter & Endless Runner combined. 

P1 (Runner) avoids obstacles, collects sparks to keep a multiplier up and picks up boosts while P2 (Shooter) uses the collected sparks as ammo to shoot down Eye Nanobots before they damage them & keeps their boss away from the vehicle.

Controls: (2 Controllers Required)

P1:

Move Left & Right - Left Analog Stick

P2:

Rotate Weapon - Right Analog Stick

Shoot - Hold Right Trigger
